data.name: Headpunk: The Comic-Style Battle Chaos
data.detailed_description:
Headpunk: The Comic-Style Battle Chaos, or Headpunk for short, is a 3D comic-style fantastic player vs. player deathmatch game.

  • 6 different types of weapons

    Pistol, Assault Rifle, Pump Gun, Sniper, Sub Machine and Rocket Launcher. - Most of these weapons are powerful. Kill players in a region in an area with a rocket launcher, or pierce your enemy's head with a sniper.

  • Character Customization

    Skin Color, Top and Bottom outfit color. - In most deathmatch games, you're stuck with one model or appearance, but Headpunk isn't like that. Better wearables will be added with future updates to the game.

  • 4 different Maps

    Training, Apocalyptic City, Midnight City and Industrial. - Play on well optimized maps. More maps will be added in the future.

  • Battle with real gamers

    There are no bots so, everyone in the game is real.

The Gameplay

This game has a simple gameplay. Shoot enemy players (everybody is your enemy) or find new tactics or improve them for even more fun.

data.short_description: Headpunk is a 3D comic-style player vs. player (PvP) deathmatch game. In the game, everyone is the enemy except you. Either shoot enemy players with the Pump Gun or blow their heads with the Rocket Launcher.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or GT 710
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit OS. Playing this game in Linux instead Windows is highly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit OS. Playing this game in Linux instead Windows is highly recommended.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 / NebiOS 1.0 "Haze"
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or GT 710
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit OS.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu Latest including non-LTS / NebiOS Latest
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 Ti
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires 64-bit OS.
